titles.title: POST IT Act of 2023
POST IT Act of 2023
Providing Opportunities to Show Transparency via Information Technology Act of 2023
POST IT Act of 2023
Providing Opportunities to Show Transparency via Information Technology Act of 2023
POST IT Act of 2023
Providing Opportunities to Show Transparency via Information Technology Act of 2023
POST IT Act of 2023
Providing Opportunities to Show Transparency via Information Technology Act of 2023
To amend the Small Business Act to require the Small Business and Agriculture Regulatory Enforcement Ombudsman to publish guidance documents for certain rules, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 26 - 0.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Reported by the Committee on Small Business. H. Rept. 118-185.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 148.

action.text: Mr. Williams (TX) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4668.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Providing Opportunities to Show Transparency via Information Technology Act of 2023 or the POST IT Act of 2023
This bill requires the Small Business Administration's Office of the National Ombudsman to include hyperlinks on its website to any guidance that sets forth policy related to a rule covered by a small entity compliance guide.
